description: type/provider allowing limited ensuring of puppet certificates as resources

properties.doc: The basic property that the resource should be in.  Valid values are `present`, `absent`.
properties.name: ensure

properties.doc: Alternate DNS names by which the certificate holder may be reached
properties.name: dns_alt_names

types.doc: Ensures that a given Puppet certificate exists or does not exist.
types.name: puppet_certificate

providers.doc: Manage Puppet certificates using the certificate face
providers.name: ruby

parameters.doc: The location of the certificate authority (local or remote)
parameters.name: ca_location

parameters.doc: The amount of time to wait for the certificate to be signed
parameters.name: waitforcert

author: Reid Vandewiele <reid@puppetlabs.com>
name: reidmv-puppet_certificate
